name: キミもvtuberにならないか？
description:
New free novel game "Will you become a vtuber too?"

One day, you came to the virtual world
Return to the real world? Or... would you make another choice?
―――A story that changes depending on your choices

I met 11 vtubers and parted.
What happens to you in the end is determined by the choices you make along the way.
There are 13 endings in all.
You decide which vtuber to choose and which fate to choose.
Let's enjoy the virtual world together!

*There are some horror expressions, so please be careful if you are not good at it.

[Game title] Will you become a vtuber too?
[Genre] Novel game
[Features] Selectable ending branch (13 types), mild horror depiction
